channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【How Halo on Xbox Scaled to 10+ Million Players using the Saga Pattern】Xbox上的光环如何使用SAGA图案缩放到100多百万球员
item.description: 【One powerful pattern for solving this problem is the Saga Pattern, a technique originally proposed in the late 1980s but increasingly relevant today.】解决此问题的一种强大模式是传奇模式，这是一种最初提出的技术，最初是在1980年代后期提出的，但今天越来越重要。

item.title: 【EP163: 12 MCP Servers You Can Use in 2025】EP163：12您可以在2025年使用的MCP服务器
item.description: 【MCP (Model Context Protocol) is an open standard that simplifies how AI models, particularly LLMs, interact with external data sources, tools, and services.】MCP（模型上下文协议）是一个开放标准，可以简化AI模型，尤其是LLMS，与外部数据源，工具和服务的交互方式。

item.title: 【Messaging Patterns Explained: Pub-Sub, Queues, and Event Streams】消息传递模式解释了：Pub-Sub，队列和事件流
item.description: 【What happens when the downstream service is overloaded? Or slow? Or down entirely?】下游服务超载时会发生什么？还是慢？还是完全下降？

item.title: 【Synchronous vs Asynchronous Communication: When to Use What?】同步与异步通信：何时使用什么？
item.description: 【At some point, every system has to make a call: Should this interaction happen synchronously or asynchronously?】在某个时候，每个系统都必须呼叫：这种交互是否应该同步或异步发生？

item.title: 【EP161: A Cheatsheet on REST API Design Best Practices】EP161：关于REST API设计最佳实践的备忘单
item.description: 【Well-designed APIs behave consistently, fair predictably, and grow without friction.】精心设计的API的行为始终如一，可以预见，并且没有摩擦。

item.title: 【How Slack Supports Billions of Daily Messages】Slack如何支持数十亿美元的每日消息
item.description: 【At peak weekday hours, Slack maintains over five million simultaneous WebSocket sessions. That’s not just a metric, but a serious architectural challenge.】在工作日高峰时段，Slack可以同时维持超过500万个Websocket会议。这不仅是一个指标，而且是一个严重的建筑挑战。

item.title: 【Engineering Trade-offs: Eventual Consistency in Practice】工程权衡：实践中最终的一致性
item.description: 【Modern applications don’t run on a single database or monolithic backend anymore. They run on event-driven, distributed systems.】现代应用程序不再在单个数据库或整体后端运行。他们在事件驱动的分布式系统上运行。

item.title: 【EP162: 9 Clean Code Principles To Keep In Mind】EP162：9牢记的清洁代码原则
item.description: 【Meaningful Names: Name variables and functions to reveal their purpose, not just their value.】有意义的名称：名称变量和功能以揭示其目的，而不仅仅是其价值。

item.title: 【How Pinterest Scaled Its Architecture to Support 500 Million Users】Pinterest如何扩展其架构以支持5亿用户
item.description: 【In this article, we’ll look at how Pinterest scaled its architecture to handle the scale and the challenges they faced along the way.】在本文中，我们将研究Pinterest如何扩展其体系结构以应对规模及其沿途面临的挑战。

item.title: 【How Canva Collects 25 Billion Events a Day】帆布如何每天收集250亿个活动
item.description: 【This article walks through how Canva structures, collects, and distributes billions of events daily, without drowning in tech debt and increasing cloud bills.】本文介绍了每天如何收集和分发数十亿个事件，而不会淹没技术债务并增加云账单。
